TFileSystemEntry Properties

Properties
 NameDescription
AttributeFlags

Represents property AttributeFlags.

CreationTime

Represents property CreationTime.

CreationTimeUtc

Represents property CreationTimeUtc.

Exists

Gets a value indicating whether the file or directory exists.

Extension

For files, gets the extension of the file.

FullName

Gets the full path of the file or directory.

IsArchive

Represents property IsArchive.

IsCompressed

Represents property IsCompressed.

IsDevice

Represents property IsDevice.

IsDirectory

Get a value indicating whether the entry is a directory.

IsEmpty

For files, Gets a value indicating whether the file is empty. For directories, indicates whether the directory contains any entry.

IsEncrypted

Represents property IsEncrypted.

IsFile

Get a value indicating whether the entry is a file.

IsHidden

Represents property IsHidden.

IsNormal

Represents property IsNormal.

IsOffline

Represents property IsOffline.

IsReadOnly

Represents property IsReadOnly.

IsSystem

Represents property IsSystem.

IsTemporary

Represents property IsTemporary.

LastAccessTime

Represents property LastAccessTime.

LastAccessTimeUtc

Represents property LastAccessTimeUtc.

LastWriteTime

Represents property LastWriteTime.

LastWriteTimeUtc

Represents property LastWriteTimeUtc.

Location

Gets the location, which is the full name of the parent directory, of the file or directory.

Name

Gets the name of the file or directory.

Owner

Gets the owner of the entry. Only available in the NTFS file systems.

Size

Gets the size, in bytes, of the file.

TypeString

Gets the friendly description of the type of the entry.
